breakfast.name: Egg White Scramble with Spinach & Feta
breakfast.instructions: Sauté spinach in olive oil, add egg whites, cook until done, sprinkle feta on top.

breakfast.name: Greek Yogurt with Almonds & Cinnamon
breakfast.instructions: Mix Greek yogurt with cinnamon, top with crushed almonds.

breakfast.name: Smoked Salmon & Avocado on Low-Carb Crackers
breakfast.instructions: Spread avocado on crackers, top with smoked salmon, squeeze lemon juice.

breakfast.name: Cottage Cheese & Walnuts with Blueberries
breakfast.instructions: Mix cottage cheese with walnuts and blueberries.

breakfast.name: Scrambled Eggs with Turkey & Cheese
breakfast.instructions: Scramble eggs with butter, mix in chopped turkey and cheese.

breakfast.name: Protein Pancakes (Almond Flour & Whey)
breakfast.instructions: Mix ingredients into a batter, cook pancakes on a skillet.

breakfast.name: Tuna & Avocado Lettuce Wraps
breakfast.instructions: Mash avocado, mix with tuna, wrap in lettuce leaves.

breakfast.name: Chicken & Egg Muffins
breakfast.instructions: Blend chicken and vegetables, mix with eggs, bake in muffin tin at 180°C for 20 mins.

breakfast.name: Whey Protein Shake with Peanut Butter
breakfast.instructions: Blend all ingredients together until smooth.

breakfast.name: Omelette with Mushrooms & Parmesan
breakfast.instructions: Sauté mushrooms in butter, add beaten eggs, cook, sprinkle parmesan on top.

breakfast.name: Chicken Sausage & Egg Muffins
breakfast.instructions: Whisk eggs, mix with chopped chicken sausage and spinach, pour into muffin tins, and bake at 180°C for 15-20 minutes.

breakfast.name: Cottage Cheese & Almond Butter Bowl
breakfast.instructions: Mix cottage cheese with almond butter and sprinkle with cinnamon.

breakfast.name: Smoked Salmon & Avocado Roll-Ups
breakfast.instructions: Spread cream cheese on smoked salmon, add avocado slices, roll up, and enjoy.

breakfast.name: Greek Yogurt & Chia Seeds
breakfast.instructions: Mix chia seeds and vanilla into Greek yogurt. Let sit for 5 minutes before eating.

breakfast.name: Scrambled Tofu with Mushrooms & Peppers
breakfast.instructions: Sauté mushrooms and peppers in olive oil, crumble in tofu, season with turmeric, and cook until heated through.

breakfast.name: Protein Pancakes with Sugar-Free Syrup
breakfast.instructions: Mix ingredients, cook pancakes on a non-stick pan, and serve with sugar-free syrup.

breakfast.name: Turkey & Spinach Omelette
breakfast.instructions: Cook turkey breast in olive oil, add spinach, then pour in egg whites and cook until set.

breakfast.name: Salmon & Scrambled Eggs
breakfast.instructions: Scramble eggs in butter and serve with smoked salmon.

breakfast.name: Avocado & Egg Breakfast Bowl
breakfast.instructions: Scramble eggs, top with avocado slices, tomatoes, and drizzle with olive oil.

breakfast.name: Chicken & Asparagus Stir-Fry
breakfast.instructions: Sauté chicken and asparagus in olive oil, add garlic and soy sauce, and cook until done.

breakfast.name: Greek Yogurt with Walnuts & Cinnamon
breakfast.instructions: Mix Greek yogurt with walnuts and sprinkle cinnamon on top.

breakfast.name: Smoked Salmon & Avocado Roll-Ups
breakfast.instructions: Spread cream cheese on salmon slices, add avocado slices, roll up, and secure with a toothpick.

breakfast.name: Egg & Turkey Bacon Wrap (Lettuce Wrap)
breakfast.instructions: Scramble eggs, cook turkey bacon, wrap in large lettuce leaves with cheese, and serve.

breakfast.name: Protein Chia Pudding
breakfast.instructions: Mix all ingredients, refrigerate overnight, and serve chilled.

breakfast.name: Cottage Cheese & Almond Butter Bowl
breakfast.instructions: Mix cottage cheese with almond butter and sprinkle cinnamon on top.

breakfast.name: Scrambled Tofu with Spinach & Mushrooms
breakfast.instructions: Sauté garlic, mushrooms, and spinach, crumble tofu in, cook for 5 minutes, and serve.

breakfast.name: Chicken & Avocado Breakfast Bowl
breakfast.instructions: Dice grilled chicken, mix with sliced avocado, cherry tomatoes, and drizzle with olive oil.

breakfast.name: Ham & Cheese Egg Cups
breakfast.instructions: Whisk eggs, mix with chopped ham and spinach, pour into muffin tins, and bake at 180°C for 15 minutes.

breakfast.name: Sardines & Avocado on Cucumber Slices
breakfast.instructions: Mash avocado with lemon juice, spread on cucumber slices, and top with sardines.

breakfast.name: Beef & Egg Scramble
breakfast.instructions: Cook ground beef with onion and garlic, add scrambled eggs, and cook until done.
